thread.title: Stylish hotel - Excellent staff
thread.title_full: Stylish hotel - Excellent staff - Review of Point A Hotel, London Canary Wharf, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: GraTurner
title: Stylish hotel - Excellent staff
text: Hotel is perfect. The location is excellent in the heart of the docklands. The rooms are very modern and stylish. Most of all the staff are excellent! We stayed with our 3 year old son and 6 week old daughter, although the hotel is generally aimed at businesses use, the staff (Nurun and Canan) who served us were genuinely concerned about our stay and did all they could to ensure we had a lovely stay. Massive thankyou, we will definitely be returning!
